alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 3:32PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Snowmelt, rainfall, and increased reservoir releases will keep river flows along the East Walker high with moderate flooding ongoing. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Moderate flooding is expected. East Walker Road and other low rural roads likely closed at lowest points. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM PDT Wednesday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM PDT Wednesday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 9.4 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. There also may be significant debris in the river channel. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon.
